registryObject.group: Grains Research and Development Corporation - Statistics for the Australian Grains Industry 3
registryObject.originatingSource: Grains Research and Development Corporation - Statistics for the Australian Grains Industry 3

name.namePart: Effective genetic control of Stagnospora nodorum blotch (SNB) 2018-19 trials

description.p: Two directional blocking design, within each direction there are 3 replicates. For each row rep, it consists of 18 rows x 18 ranges (columns). For each column rep, it consists of 54 rows x 6 ranges. Overall, the design has 54 rows x 18 ranges
Variables: HD, HGT, PLAD (Percentage lead area diseased)
Experimental design elements: RCBD, Two-way blocking

rights.p: By agreement from GRDC and dataset co-owners

relatedInfo.title: DAW1507-002RTX
relatedInfo.notes: DAW00248 - Effective genetic control of Stagonospora nodorum blotch

relatedInfo.title: Research Organisation
relatedInfo.notes: Department of Primary Industries and Regional Development
relatedInfo.identifier: Department of Primary Industries and Regional Development
